meanings.definition: A skin condition characterized by the presence of multiple furuncles.
meanings.sent1: Her furunculoses caused discomfort and required medical attention.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her with furunculoses after examining the boils on her skin.
meanings.sent3: Despite their small size, the furunculoses on his back made him feel like a dragon with scales.
meanings.sent4: The furunculoses spread like wildfire, creating a patchwork of red bumps on her arms.
meanings.sent5: The relentless itching from the furunculoses kept her up all night, tossing and turning.

meanings.definition: The state of having furuncles on the skin.
meanings.sent1: The furunculoses on his face made him self-conscious in public.
meanings.sent2: She applied a soothing cream to alleviate the discomfort caused by the furunculoses.
meanings.sent3: The furunculoses on his arm seemed to have a mind of their own, popping up unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: The furunculoses dotted her skin like tiny volcanoes waiting to erupt.
meanings.sent5: The persistent furunculoses made her skin resemble a bumpy road, uneven and rough to the touch.
